alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:47AM CST until January 30 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Bevill Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Pickens and Greene Counties. Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Marengo and Greene Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Demopolis Lock and Dam affecting Sumter, Hale, Marengo and Greene Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tombigbee River and flood warnings remain in effect. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River at Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Saturday the stage was 95.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 99.9 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall to 99.8 feet tomorrow morning. It will rise to flood stage Monday morning. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
